commentText:
Should we close this Connection, obtained from this DataSource?_

Code that uses Connections from a SmartDataSource should always_perform a check via this method before invoking close()._

Note that the JdbcTemplate class in the 'jdbc.core' package takes care of_releasing JDBC Connections, freeing application code of this responsibility._@param con the Connection to check_@return whether the given Connection should be closed_@see java.sql.Connection#close()

Should we close this Connection, obtained from this DataSource?_

Code that uses Connections from a SmartDataSource should always_perform a check via this method before invoking {@code close()}._

Note that the JdbcTemplate class in the 'jdbc.core' package takes care of_releasing JDBC Connections, freeing application code of this responsibility._@param con the Connection to check_@return whether the given Connection should be closed_@see java.sql.Connection#close()
